name: VIDEO_SOURCE_CONNECTION_LOST
description:
Occurs when the SDK cannot reconnect to Agora's edge server 10 seconds after its connection to the server is interrupted.The callback for the second instance.
            The SDK triggers this callback when it cannot connect to the server 10 seconds after calling the videoSourceJoinChannel method, regardless of whether it is in the channel. If the SDK fails to rejoin the channel 20 minutes after being disconnected from Agora's edge server, the SDK stops rejoining the channel.
